#labels lagarto,swap,python
= Lagarto-SWAP: lagarto server for SWAP networks =

= Introduction =

Lagarto-SWAP is the server that talks to panStamps. This process relies on [pyswap pyswap] and takes advantage of the whole functionality provided by the python library.

= Configuration =

Lagarto-SWAP is entirely configured from the web interface. Default http port is 8001 so in order to access the web interface we should open the following URL:

http:\\ip_address:8001
